mapper.select: SELECT ORG010.ORG_ID, -- 단체ID ORG010.ORG_NAME, -- 단체명 MEMBER010.MEMBER_ID, -- 회원ID MEMBER010.MEMBER_NAME, -- 회원명 MEMBER010.EMAIL, -- 이메일 MEMBER010.HP_NO, -- 전화번호 MEMBER010.MOBILE_LOGIN_DATE, -- 모바일 로그인 날짜 MEMBER010.MEMBER_TP, -- 회원 등급 -- 회원등급명 (SELECT CD_V_MEANING FROM tb_s020.tb_s020_code010 WHERE CD_TP = 'MEMBER_TP' AND CATEGORY ='000' AND CD_V = MEMBER010.MEMBER_TP) AS MEMBER_TP_NM FROM tb_s020.tb_s020_member010 MEMBER010 INNER JOIN tb_s020.tb_s020_org010 ORG010 ON MEMBER010.ORG_ID = ORG010.ORG_ID WHERE MEMBER010.DATA_END_STATUS IS NULL AND MEMBER010.ORG_ID = #{orgId} AND MEMBER010.CREATE_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDt}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i%S') AND DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#{toDt}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i%S'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND MEMBER010.MEMBER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberName}, '%') AND MEMBER010.MEMBER_TP = #{memberTp}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_s020.tb_s020_member010 SET DATA_END_STATUS = ‘*’, DATA_END_PROGRAM_ID = 'S021100030' DATA_END_TIMESTAMP = SYSDATE() WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
